articles.title: Wildfires show why CBC needs public safety mandate, McGill research centre says
articles.author: CBC
articles.summary: Public safety should be added to CBC/Radio-Canada's mandate, according to a new report from a research centre at McGill University. The wildfires that are flaring up across Canada again are one of the reasons public safety is a priority for CBC and Radio-Canada.
